summary: A detective and a fortune teller join forces to find a kidnapped child whom none expects to be alive.
cast: Yoon-seok Kim|Hae-Jin Yoo|Jeong Ho-bin|Bong-sik Hyun|Ji-Geon Jang|Myeong-gap Jang|Sun-mi Jin|Young Ho Joo|Tae-Hoon Kim|Ho-Chul Lee|Joon-hyuk Lee|Yoon-Hee Lee|Moon-cheol Nam|Young-chang Song|Jin-Ha Yoon|Jang Young-Nam
title: Geukbisusa
